import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { FaUserTie, FaChartBar, FaEnvelope, FaSearch } from 'react-icons/fa'; function Home() { const [jobs, setJobs] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { fetch('http://localhost:5000/api/jobs') .then(res => res.json()) .then(data => setJobs(data.slice(0, 3))); }, []); return (
